messages.game-start:
**Welcome to The Bluerose Hospital.**

Death presides in a hospital, it always has and always will. However, when faced in a true scenario of life and death, malice and malign take hold. Who will gain control of the situation?

This is the general chat channel and the primary platform for gameplay discussion. All players are able to see this channel.
messages.whisper-log:
**This is the Billboard.**

This channel is normally used for whispers, but since whispers are disabled in this game, this channel has become a secondary discussion channel. Players are advised to direct the purpose of this channel to suit their needs.
messages.mafia:
**This is the Mafia Chat.**

This channel is only open at night for members of the Mafia to communicate.
messages.daytime-quote: **It is now daytime. The trial has now begun.**
messages.nighttime-quote: **Night has descended. Remember to use your night actions if you intend to!**
messages.singular-lynch: :syringe: Furious, the bloodthirsty hospital residents forced {;player} into the morgue and coated them with formaldehyde. They have been lynched.
messages.plural-lynch: :syringe: Furious, the bloodthirsty hospital residents forced {;players} into the morgue and coated them with formaldehyde. They have been lynched.
messages.abstain-lynch: **The hospital residents have decided nobody goes into formaldehyde today.**
messages.game-over:
**Game over!**

This channel is now open to everyone who has participated in the game.
